name: Restless Dreams (2015)
description:
Restless Dreams (alt. name: Project Gray) is an indie Lovecraftian J-RPG with strong survival horror elements currently in development. Gameplay wise, it is inspired by Silent Hill and the classic Resident Evil.

It is set six years after the event of Nightmare of the Snow. Despite so, you can still play the game without having to complete Nightmare of the Snow beforehand.

Plot:
Renn Kiriyama is an unsociable, 22 years old upcoming fighter and university student with a dark past. One night, he has a dream where he wakes up in a dark sewer inhabited by grotesque creatures. As he succeeded in escaping the sewer, he meets up with his loved one, Haruka Kurashina. She tells him that the world has ended and he has to save the world, no matter what. And with that, his first nightmare ends.
